content: **aspen pom pom hat** the aspen pom pom hat is a simple and quick project that can be worn two ways as a slouchy hat or with the brim folded up it pairs perfectly with any of the patterns from the aspen collection the entire collection is designed for warmth and functionality each piece is made up of crochet ribbing stitches to give them a classic and gender neutral look they all work up quickly making them great for gifts or for building craft fair inventory i used some of the same stitches and design elements in the cypress collection so that the two collections could be used together to create unique and coordinating sets the pattern calls for bulky weight 5 yarn or two strands of worsted/aran weight 4 yarn mine are made with two strands of lion brand re-tweed yarn which is a heavier weight 4 it is labeled a worsted however it works up more like an aran weight i recommend choosing a heavier weight 5 lion brand hue + me works great or an aran weight yarn be sure to check your gauge to get a good fit the aspen hat is worked flat and then the ends are slip stitched together a combination of ribbing stitches in the hat creates shaping that makes cinching the top easier and insures a comfy brim you will need to know how to work basic stitches into the back loops of the previous row and how to find the back ridges if the foundation chain the pattern includes instructions for three sizes teen/adult small head measuring 20 -22 adult medium 21 -23 and adult large 22 -24 instructions for different sizes have been color coded throughout the pattern if a size has specific directions they will be green for size small red for medium and blue for large this includes stitch counts and row numbers written in english using u s terms **what you ll need ** yarn - worsted/aran - approx 250 270 290 yds bulky - approx 125 135 145 yds hook - u s k/6 5 mm or any hook to meet gauge needle for weaving in ends scissors pom pom sign up to get emails about new patterns and a free pattern every month at https //www winterwooldesigns com/ 1 1 https //www winterwooldesigns com/
